Course Description: THIS COURSE PROVIDES STUDENTS WITH A BASIC UNDERSTANDING OF WELL-CONTROLLED INFORMATION SYSTEMS IN A VARIETY OF TECHNOLOGICAL ENVIRONMENTS WITH ADDED EMPHASIS ON THE COLLECTION, PROCESSING, AND REPORTING OF ACCOUNTING INFORMATION.
Textbook(s): ACCOUNTING INFORMATION SYSTEMS BY ROMNEY AND STEINBART ACCESS 2003 NEW PERSPECTIVES COMPREHENSIVE.
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
